alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dodge (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 7:33PM CDT until May 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 733 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Randolph, or 7 miles northwest of Beaver Dam, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Randolph, Fox Lake, Friesland and Astico. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
